content: SPX Fine Finish diamond cup wheel (flat) Ultimate flat diamond cup wheel for angle grinders – for finishing grinding of concrete and natural stone ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- - - ### FEATURES:Features Creates a smooth surface finish thanks to the fine diamond mixture Fine finish diamond cup wheel specialized in gentle material removal Advanced hole pattern – constantly cools the steel disc to prolong its lifetime Low vibration thanks to advanced core balancing technology Engineered for improved reliability – CD welding and highest-grade materials used throughout Applications Finishing grinding on concrete and natural stone, surface preparation ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Cordless angle grinder, Corded angle grinder Base material: Concrete, Natural stone Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Tool type | Cordless angle grinder, Corded angle grinder | Base material | Concrete, Natural stone | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2238545 - Diamond cup wheel DG-CW 4 1/2 SPX finef - Package Size 1 pc - 2238546 - Diamond cup wheel DG-CW 5 SPX finef - Package Size 1 pc
